TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaColumn extends System.Object implements class System.Web.DynamicData.IFieldFormattingOptions

summary.span: 表示 Dynamic Data 所使用的資料庫資料行。

span.span: Represents a database column that is used by Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 動態資料應用程式中，類別表示的資料庫欄位。In ASP.NET Dynamic Data applications, the class represents a database field. 類別可讓您擷取資料欄位，例如類型和中繼資料資訊的相關資訊。The class lets you retrieve information about the data field such as type and metadata information. 您可以擷取之資料表的資料欄位屬於使用屬性。You can retrieve the table that the data field belongs to by using the property. 您也可以使用擷取的資料模型屬性。You can also retrieve the data model by using the property.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.DynamicData.MetaTable table, class System.Web.DynamicData.ModelProviders.ColumnProvider columnProvider) cil managed

param.name: table
param.span: 包含資料行的中繼資料表。

span.span: The meta table that contains the column.
The column provider.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property AllowInitialValue As Boolean
public: property bool AllowInitialValue { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定是否允許將值插入至資料行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether a column enables a value to be inserted.

value.span: 如果允許將值插入至該資料行則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the column enables a value to be inserted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值是`false`資料行時唯讀和`true`當資料行不是唯讀狀態。The default value is `false` when the column is read-only and `true` when the column is not read-only. 預設值可以使用覆寫屬性。The default value can be overridden by using the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplyFormatInEditMode As Boolean
public: property bool ApplyFormatInEditMode { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當資料繫結控制項 (其中含有 物件所表示的資料欄位) 處於編輯模式時， 屬性指定的格式化字串是否套用至欄位值。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values when the data-bound control that contains the data field that is represented by the object is in edit mode.

value.span: 如果當資料繫結控制項 (其中含有 物件所表示的資料欄位) 處於編輯模式時 屬性指定的格式化字串套用至欄位值則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the formatting string specified by the property is applied to field values when the data-bound control that contains the data field that is represented by the object is in edit mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會驗證屬性會套用至資料欄位，並擷取的值屬性。The property verifies if a attribute is applied to the data field and retrieves the value of the property. 如果找不到屬性，這個屬性會驗證屬性會套用至擷取格式化資訊。If a attribute is not found, this property verifies if a attribute is applied to retrieve formatting information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未不指定任何顯示名稱屬性會傳回其已設定，如果資料欄位的易記顯示名稱或欄位名稱。The property returns the friendly display name for the data field if one has been set, or the field name if no display name has been specified. 屬性會驗證方法是檢查是否已設定的易記顯示名稱屬性會套用至資料欄位。The property verifies if a friendly display name has been set by checking if a attribute is applied to the data field.

span.span: if the data field type can contain long strings; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL 型別`text`， `ntext`， `varchar`，和`nvarchar`可包含長字串。The SQL types `text`, `ntext`, `varchar`, and `nvarchar` can contain long strings. 值屬性用來決定是否讓使用者能夠修改欄位值顯示的文字方塊或文字區域的欄位樣板。The value of the property is used to determine whether the TextBox or TextArea field template is displayed to enable users to modify the field value.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會驗證如果屬性會套用至資料欄位，或如果資料庫結構描述包含資料的資訊欄位所需要的資料庫來決定資料欄位是否需要值。The property verifies if a attribute is applied to the data field or if the database schema contains information about the data field being required in the database to determine whether the data field requires a value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResetMetadata() cil managed
abstract member ResetMetadata : unit -> unit override this.ResetMetadata : unit -> unit

summary.span: 清除快取的資料行中繼資料。

span.span: Clears cached column metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料行中繼資料是衍生自屬性和快取效能的資訊。The column metadata is information that is derived from attributes and that is cached for performance. 呼叫這個方法會清除這個資料行的中繼資料快取。Calling this method clears the metadata cache for this column. 中繼資料快取就會重建要求任何衍生自中繼資料的資訊在下一次。The metadata cache is rebuilt the next time any information that is derived from metadata is requested.

value.span: 如果應該顯示資料欄位則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the data field should be displayed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出它自動產生 ASP.NET Dynamic data 時，是否應該顯示資料欄位。The property indicates whether a data field should be displayed when it is automatically generated by ASP.NET Dynamic Data. 這個屬性會驗證屬性套用至資料欄位，並傳回的值屬性。This property verifies if a attribute is applied to the data field and returns the value of the property. 如果屬性不會套用至資料欄位、 Dynamic Data 用下列規則來判斷是否要顯示的資料行：If a attribute is not applied to the data field, Dynamic Data uses the following rules to determine whether to display the column: - 如果屬性套用至資料欄位，顯示資料欄位。If a attribute is applied to the data field, the data field is displayed. 此規則會覆寫所有其他規則。This rule overrides all the other rules. - 如果值屬性是`true`，不會顯示資料欄位。If the value of the property is `true`, the data field is not displayed. 這是因為動態資料以不同方式處理外部索引鍵欄位，而且通常不會顯示外部索引鍵欄位值。This occurs because Dynamic Data handles foreign-key fields in a different way and will not typically display the foreign-key field value. - 如果值屬性是`true`，不會顯示資料欄位。If the value of the property is `true`, the data field is not displayed. 通常會自動產生資料庫中的欄位不會包含相關資訊。Typically fields that are automatically generated in the database do not contain relevant information. 請確定您套用屬性設定為 [資料] 欄位中，如果必須顯示資料欄位。Make sure that you apply the attribute to the data field, if the data field must be displayed. - 如果值屬性是`true`，不會顯示資料欄位。If the value of the property is `true`, the data field is not displayed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供此屬性是控制項和其他控制項，因為需要的簡短名稱的位置將資料行標頭空間有限。This property is provided for control and other controls where a short name is needed because of limited column-header space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會驗證屬性會套用至資料欄位，並擷取的值屬性。The property verifies if a attribute is applied to the data field and retrieves the value of the property. 如果屬性不會套用至資料欄位屬性會傳回空字串。If a attribute is not applied to the data field, the property returns an empty string.

span.span: ASP.NET Dynamic Data Scaffolding
